"Alvin stepped up midseason, he's been a great leader on and off the court through his 30 years of coaching. He's got a great spirit and knowledge... I'd like to thank him for that."
"We have confidence Fox and Sabonis will be the pillars of what we are building here."

On the coaching search: "We have an offseason, we have time, the number one thing is we find the right person to come in here and partner with me and the rest of our staff and getting this thing right."
"[Fox and Sabonis] are going to get an offseason together, they're already bonding with their teammates. I view it as we got a head start [making the trade] earlier rather than later."
McNair believes Fox and Davion have proven they can play together but ultimately, new coach will decide how that all works.
On draft philosophy: We want a guy that's going to impact from day one and for years and years to come.
